summary:
Linear Finance - The first cross-chain compatible, delta-one asset protocol.

 Stake.Build.Earn - A decentralized application for staking and building LUSD, accepting a mixture of LINA tokens and other major cryptocurrencies.

 Spend.Invest.Diversify - Linear.Exchange enables trading of a variety of liquid assets (Liquids) based on spot cryptocurrencies, commodities, and thematic indexes with nearly instant confirmation time and immediate finality.

 Transfer Across Chain.Gas Savings.Composability - Our custom built swap functionality that helps save gas fees and allows composability of LINA tokens across different blockchains.

 Our custom built yield generating vault - Lock ℓUSD or LP tokens to passively and efficiently earn interest paid in ℓUSD, BUSD and LINA tokens.
